content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When asked to start and staff a potential project, you need to know when to create an Opportunity vs. a New Project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSTAFPUB/Staffing+Desk+User+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk User Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An Opportunity is a potential project created in CRM (for business development activities tracking) and Staffing Desk (to kick off staffing) when negotiations between EPAM and a Customer about starting a new project are in progress. This means that the client has not yet approved the project, either verbally or in writing. An opportunity is created when we are working with a new client and/or the engagement is not scheduled to start immediately (>2 weeks).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is a high probability that a new project will start (95%), especially in a short time frame (~2 weeks out), or a client has already approved a budget verbally or in writing, you can convert the Opportunity to Project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a new external project needs to be started from scratch (no Opportunity in Staffing Desk), please talk to your Account Manager – they need to initiate a project from the opportunity in CRM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Initiation of an External Project\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Initiation of a new project is an important part of project management, as it kicks off the project in our internal systems and notifies key stakeholders.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a5fc9162-95a5-4fcb-af77-5b3449a97831/image2020-2-14_16-27-46.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":811,\"height\":202.00000000000003}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step 1 -
